label: For patients 18 years or older. For initiation.
header: Step 2: Verify Prescriber and Patient Documentation

items.text: Document that the patient has participated in a comprehensive weight management program that encourages behavioral modification, reduced-calorie diet, and increased physical activity with a continuing follow-up for at least 6 months prior to using drug therapy.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.text: Documented baseline body mass index (BMI) ≥ 30 kg/m^2.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Document that the patient has been on a weight loss regimen of a low-calorie diet, increased physical activity, and behavioral modifications for a minimum of 6 months prior to initiating therapy with Wegovy
Document the patient did not achieve a weight loss of 1 pound or more per week while on the weight loss regimen prior to initiating therapy with Wegovy
Document the patient is currently on and will continue a weight loss regimen of a low-calorie diet, increased physical activity, and behavioral modifications
Document that the patient does NOT have a personal or family history of medullary thyroid carcinoma or Multiple Endocrine Neoplasia syndrome type 2 or have a history of pancreatitis
Document that the patient does NOT have a known hypersensitivity to semaglutide or any of the ingredients in Wegovy
Document the patient will NOT be using the requested agent in combination with another targeted weight loss agent for the requested indication
Document the patient has not tried a targeted weight loss agent in the past 12 months
Document the patient will NOT be using Wegovy in combination with another GLP-1 receptor agonist agent

label: For patients 18 years or older. For initiation. For South Asian, Southeast Asian, or East Asian descent
header: Step 2: Verify Prescriber and Patient Documentation

items.text: Documented baseline body mass index (BMI) ≥ 25 kg/m^2.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.label: Document that the patient has been on a weight loss regimen of a low-calorie diet, increased physical activity, and behavioral modifications for a minimum of 6 months prior to initiating therapy with Wegovy
Document the patient did not achieve a weight loss of 1 pound or more per week while on the weight loss regimen prior to initiating therapy with Wegovy
Document the patient is currently on and will continue a weight loss regimen of a low-calorie diet, increased physical activity, and behavioral modifications
Document that the patient does NOT have a personal or family history of medullary thyroid carcinoma or Multiple Endocrine Neoplasia syndrome type 2 or have a history of pancreatitis
Document that the patient does NOT have a known hypersensitivity to semaglutide or any of the ingredients in Wegovy
Document the patient will NOT be using the requested agent in combination with another targeted weight loss agent for the requested indication
The patient does NOT have a personal or family history of medullary thyroid carcinoma or Multiple Endocrine Neoplasia syndrome type 2 or have a history of pancreatitis
The patient does NOT have a known hypersensitivity to semaglutide or any of the ingredients in Wegovy
Document the patient has not tried a targeted weight loss agent in the past 12 months
Document the patient will NOT be using Wegovy in combination with another GLP-1 receptor agonist agent

label: For patients 18 years or older. For continuation of therapy.
header: Step 2: Verify Prescriber and Patient Documentation

items.text: The patient has completed at least 3 months of therapy with the requested drug at a stable maintenance dose.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.text: Documentated loss of at least 5 percent of baseline body weight.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.text: Documented continued maintainance of their initial 5 percent weight loss.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.text: The requested drug will be used with a reduced-calorie diet and increased physical activity for chronic weight management.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

label: For patients 12 to 17 years old. For initiation of therapy.
header: Step 2: Verify Prescriber and Patient Documentation

items.text: Document that the requested drug will be used with a reduced-calorie diet and increased physical activity for chronic weight management.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.text: Document that the patient has participated in a comprehensive weight management program that encourages behavioral modification, reduced-calorie diet, and increased physical activity with continuing follow-up for at least 6 months prior to using drug therapy.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.text: Document that the patient has an initial body mass index (BMI) in the 95th percentile or greater standardized for age and sex (obesity).
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

label: For patients 12 to 17 years old. For continuation of therapy.
header: Step 2: Verify Prescriber and Patient Documentation

items.text: A documented reduction or continued reduction from their baseline body mass index (BMI).
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).
